p: In a study by Zeidán-Chuliá et al. on the antibacterial properties of S. hortensis L. EO and M. Salvia fruticosa on Fusobacterium nucleatum, it was shown that both herbal EOs exhibited effective antibacterial properties against bacterial species above. However, the effect of S. hortensis L. was stronger due to a higher concentration of terpenes.[ 49]
